00010 public final class GameController
00011 {
00013         private final GameStateModule game;
00015         private final IOModule io;
00017         private final AIModule[] players;
00019         private final int AI_time;
00020 
00022 
00031         public GameController(final GameStateModule game, final IOModule io, final AIModule[] players, final int AI_time)
00032         {
00033                 assert players.length == 2 : "Should only have two players.";
00034 
00035                 this.game = game;
00036                 this.io = io;
00037                 this.players = players;
00038                 this.AI_time = AI_time;
00039         }
00040 
00042 
00045         public void play()
00046         {
00047                 // Draw the initial board
00048                 io.drawBoard(game);
00049                 // While not finished
00050                 while(!game.isGameOver())
00051                         // for both players
00052                         for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00053                         {
00054                                 final AIModule player = players[i];
00055                                 // If the player is human than make a move request
00056                                 if(player == null)
00057                                         tryMakeMove(io.getHumanMove());
00058                                 else
00059                                         callAI(player, "Player " + (i + 1));
00060 
00061                                 // Update graphics
00062                                 io.drawBoard(game);
00063                                 // Break if done
00064                                 if(game.isGameOver())
00065                                         break;
00066                         }
00067         }
00068 
00070 
00078         private void callAI(final AIModule ai, final String AIName)
00079         {
00080                 // Make a duplicate GameStateModule to avoid any unwanted changes to the board
00081                 final GameStateModule duplicate = game.copy();
00082                 ai.terminate = false;
00083                 // Run the ai in another thread
00084                 final Thread t = new Thread()
00085                 {
00086                         @Override
00087                         public void run()
00088                         {
00089                                 ai.getNextMove(duplicate);
00090                         }
00091                 };
00092                 t.start();
00093                 int move = -1;
00094                 try
00095                 {
00096                         // Wait until the ai has finished or has timed out
00097                         t.join(AI_time);
00098                         // Set the terminate flag so that the AI knows it should wrap up its computations
00099                         ai.terminate = true;
00100                         if(t.isAlive())
00101                         {
00102                                 // Allow 100ms margin before throwing the exception
00103                                 t.join(100);
00104                                 if(t.isAlive())
00105                                         throw new RuntimeException(AIName + " did not terminate when told to do so.");
00106                         }
00107                         // Get the selected move
00108                         move = ai.chosenMove;
00109                 }
00110                 catch(Exception e)
00111                 {
00112                         e.printStackTrace();
00113                         System.exit(-1);
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 // Try to make the move. If it fails then arbitrarily assign the move
00117                 tryMakeMove(move);
00118         }
00119 
00121 
00127         private void tryMakeMove(final int move)
00128         {
00129                 // If the move is illegal, make some valid move and write to System.err
00130                 if(!game.canMakeMove(move))
00131                 {
00132                         for(int j = 0; j < game.getWidth(); j++)
00133                                 if(game.canMakeMove(j))
00134                                 {
00135                                         game.makeMove(j);
00136                                         System.err.println("Attempted to play illegal move " + move +
00137                                                                            ".  Computer automatically played legal move " + j +
00138                                                                            " instead.");
00139                                         break;
00140                                 }
00141                 }
00142                 else
00143                         game.makeMove(move);
00144         }
00145 }
